document.full_text: record snow and rain this year have caused unprecedented flooding in the missouri river, resulting in a dangerous and sometimes fatal swim for the prongback antelope during its seasonal migration. longer-term, some experts worry that climate change could rob the antelope of its ancestral memory and ability to migrate.
document.title: for weary antelope, a perilous swim
lines_and_colors: record snow and rain this year have caused unprecedented flooding in the missouri river, resulting in a dangerous and sometimes fatal swim for the prongback antelope during its seasonal migration. longer-term, some experts worry that climate change could rob the antelope of its ancestral memory and ability to migrate.
